text: Amir Ohana, Hebrew: אמיר אוחנה , (born 15 March 1976 in Beer Sheba) is an Israeli politician and lawyer. Previously he worked at Shin Bet (internal intelligence agency of Israel). He is the Speaker of the Knesset (Israeli parliament) since 29 December 2022. Ohana has been a Member of the Knesset for Likud since 2015. He is the first openly gay MK for his party.www.haaretz.com From 2019 to 2020 he was justice minister in the Fourth Netanyahu Government, and from 2020 to 2021 he was minister of internal security in the Fifth Netanyahu Government. == References == == Other websites == *Knesset Website Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Gay Jews Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:Israeli intelligence people Category:Israeli lawyers Category:Israeli LGBT politicians Category:LGBT lawyers Category:Likud politicians Category:Members of the Knesset Category:People from Beer Sheba
title: Amir Ohana
